output_list.criticism: The increaseApproval function does not have any checks to prevent integer overflow. This can be exploited by the owner to increase the balance of an arbitrary spender.
The decreaseApproval function does not have any checks to prevent integer overflow. This can be exploited by the owner to decrease the balance of an arbitrary spender.
The mint function does not have any checks to prevent integer overflow. This can be exploited by the owner to create a new token for a given buyer.
The pullBack function does not have any checks to prevent integer overflow. This can be exploited by the owner to retrieve a specific amount of tokens from a given buyer.
The showMyTokenBalance function does not have any checks to prevent integer overflow. This can be exploited by the owner to display the balance of a given token holder.
